DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Soccer Face Painting Stencil Kits (3 colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Soccer Face Painting Stencil Kit is specially designed to suit Soccer themed events and holidays. Includes 2 ml Snazaroo paints in 3 colors (White, Black and Bright Red), a sponge applicator, stencil with GO TEAM!, a circle, ball details and flames. Specially designed to adjust to the curvature of the face or skin. Easy to apply and remove.
Snazaroo Mylar stencils are easy to use, durable and easy to clean. Snazaroo products are all non-toxic and hypoallergenic and meet US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3 color Snazaroo Stencil Kit will paint about 600 cheek art designs
Includes three 2 ml Snazaroo paints in White, Black and Bright Red, plus a sponge applicator and Mylar stencil (GO TEAM!, a circle, ball details and flames).
One of the most popular face paints in the world
